name: Code Extended
text:
Select 1 Link 3 "Code Talker" Link Monster you control and change it to "Decode Talker Extended".
If you select "Decode Talker" in your Extra Monster Zone, you can also select 1 opponent monster and move that target to their Main Monster Zone in the same column as the monster you have selected.
This Skill can only be used once per Duel.
